response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it would be an excellent investment for you. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $11,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings while ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your needs and goals.", "product_price": 11000}
